answers.answer: Urine test**** not June test lol
My blood pressure crept up a but a few weeks ago and I'm high riak of pre eclampsia due to low PAPP-A but after 2 high readings and no protein in my urine my BP  has now gone back down to normal. T
Oops I hadn't finished my reply....Try not to worry to much as this will keep the BP up. I did some relaxation breathing exercises and listened to relaxation music!
thank you that's helps a lot, how long until you got your results back? I'd love to relax all day although it's kinda tough with a 2 year old lol

question: Just left my dr (I'll be 37 weeks tomorrow) and she said my blood pressure is borderline of being high. She sent me home with a jug to day a 24 hour June test to check for protein in my urine. If it comes back positive I have to be induced next week :( I'm really nervous. Anyone else been through this? How do I keep blood pressure down? I don't eat bored nor drink sodas
title: Preeclampsia? Help!
